Reviews.Title: Iphone 4 8GB
Reviews.Author: Natalie
Reviews.Content: Very fast shipping but was upsetting because what i thought was a verizon iphone turned out to be a sprint. The phone was brand new and for a good price but it wasnt what i asked for nor what it was advertised as. Although i was able to sell the phone im still lost about 70 dollars because i wasnt able to seel it for as much as i bought it

Reviews.Title: Louissanna
Reviews.Author: Faraco Louissanna D
Reviews.Content: like other comments, the product you offered was not what I ordered and very irresponsible not want to meet my application back and cover the costs that entails and that was not my mistake, but the store that deceptively published a product that my need is completely useless. I do not recommend to buy it

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: Great phone! Looks great works great, easy to activate with our provider.  The battery doesn't last as long as a new phone, but nothing a car charger won't handle.

ProductInfo.Features:
Internet wireless access and browsing (802.11b/g/n) Lets you access the Web via Safari web browser. iPhone iOS 4 operating system provides high-level functionality.
Multiple networks Operates on GSM/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900MHz and UMTS/HSDPA/HSUPA 850/900/1900/2100MHz networks so you can access the Web.
3.5" widescreen Multi-Touch Retina display The 960-by-640-pixel resolution makes text amazingly crisp and images amazingly sharp. Fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating lets you tap, touch and manipulate menus without damaging the screen.
8GB built-in memory For storage of your music, photos, videos, contacts and more.
Built-in 5.0MP digital camera with LED flash Features 5x digital zoom and advanced backside illumination sensor for brighter, clearer low-light photos. New front-facing camera makes it easy to take self-portraits.
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPhone 4 MD146LL/A 8GB Black For Verizon (No Contract) Sealed
